message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take a bit more considering the inflation risk, but you still get a good deal.
My turn, fair split considering the risk
Okay, let's try this. A fair split considering the time pressure and the fact that inflation is working against me.
Inflation is on your side to make a deal now
This is my final offer above a 50/50 split.  The time pressure is significant now, and we both lose if we don't agree.

This is it, a straight 50/50 split. We are running out of time, and any further disagreement benefits neither of us.
